img_above_text:
Finally, he can also simply hang back and toss two poison-coated daggers your way in a quick throw, requiring good reaction time to evade.
Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection.
img_below_text:
If you've got a good idea of his attack patterns, using the Smash Stance's varied combo to "see through" his attacks can be extremely useful to power through his slices to hit him while he's unable to defend, and the follow-up heavystrike you can unlock usually can't be blocked by him either.
The good news is once you've taken out half of his real health bar (not his sword's defense bar), he'll break off the attack and retreat. The bad news is you haven't seen the last of him.
summary_promot:

Note that if you try to press your attack while he's in an idle or defensive posture, he'll eventually deflect your combo with a louder block noise, and then retaliate -- but you can beat him at his own game by deflecting after his deflection."
        - Following Text: "If you've got a good idea of his attack patterns, using the Smash Stance's varied combo to "see through" his attacks can be extremely useful to power through his slices to hit him while he's unable to defend, and the follow-up heavystrike you can unlock usually can't be blocked by him either.
The good news is once you've taken out half of his real health bar (not his sword's defense bar), he'll break off the attack and retreat. The bad news is you haven't seen the last of him."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from a video game, where the player character is engaged in a fight against an enemy named "Nonh White." The setting is a dimly lit, ancient stone courtyard with statues lining the walls. The enemy is emitting a red aura, suggesting a special attack or phase. The player's health, stamina, and ability icons are visible, indicating active gameplay. This moment aligns with the guide's context, emphasizing the importance of timing, deflection, and understanding the enemy's attack patterns to succeed in the encounter.
